posts.post_title: Nice Looking T206 Raw Lot (3) SOLD
posts.post_content:
Great looking lot with hard-to-see wrinkles --> SOLD
Check or paypal gift.

PM or email sarpc at qwestoffice dot net

First committed email gets the cards.  Will read PMs but emails have priority.

Ames (Hands at Chest) Piedmont 150 -- Tough 150-only subject; light wrinkling on front; slight blue color shift

Dubuc Piedmont 350 -- Light wrinkle near bottom border; slight diamond cut

Howard (Chicago) Piedmont 350 -- Tougher 350-only subject; light wrinkle on back middle of card

Cards are all technical VG in my opinion but have much better eye appeal.

Thanks.

Scot Reader
